attributes.action: CHANGE THE LAW AROUND THE MANSLAUGHTER OF POLICE OFFICERS
attributes.additional_details: THERE IS A DEFICIENCY IN THE CRIMINAL JUSTICE SYSTEM WITH THE PENALTY FOR A MANSLAUGHTER CONVICTION OF A POLICE OFFICER BEING TOO LENIENT.
attributes.background: THE KILLING OF A POLICE OFFICER WHILST IN THE LAWFUL EXECUTION OF HIS DUTY THAT LEADS TO A MANSLAUGHTER CONVICTION SHOULD LEAD TO AN AUTOMATIC 20 YEARS CUSTODIAL SENTENCE.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/332844
